evidence.text: 28 | 2024-03-28 | MOTION for Preliminary Injunction by John Mann Anderson. (Story, Lonnie)

extracted.value: John Mann Anderson filed a Motion for Preliminary Injunction on March 28, 2024, seeking immediate injunctive relief to address prison conditions.

evidence.text: 29 | 2024-03-25 | MOTION for Partial Summary Judgment on Exhaustion Grounds by Kevin A Carr, Randall Hepp, Jared Hoy, Yana Pusich, Melissa Roberts, Wisconsin Department of Corrections. (Jaber, Samir)

extracted.value: Kevin A Carr, Randall Hepp, Jared Hoy, Yana Pusich, Melissa Roberts, and Wisconsin Department of Corrections filed a Motion for Partial Summary Judgment on Exhaustion Grounds on March 25, 2024, arguing plaintiffs failed to exhaust administrative remedies.

evidence.text: 34 | 2024-03-28 | First MOTION to Certify Class by All Plaintiffs. (Story, Lonnie)

extracted.value: All Plaintiffs filed a First Motion to Certify Class on March 28, 2024, seeking class certification for their claims regarding prison conditions and isolation.
